info.presentation: I have outstanding experience and knowledge in using React Js to create highly responsive fullstack web applications that perfectly suit your requirements as a client.
info.me_name: A pleasure, my name is Omar Proa√±o
info.me: and I am dedicated to web development, with a specialization in React.js. I am passionate about technology and have an impressive ability to learn on my own. I am 20 years old and I am originally from Quito, Ecuador, a city located between mountains. I would very much like to be part of your team, if you have any questions or want to know more about me, you can contact me through my social networks or by sending a message using the contact form.

skill.text: Some of my skills as a web developer focused on meeting your web application needs.

languages.html: Strong knowledge of how to structure and display your site so that it is visible on the web.
languages.css: Experience in styling the components for your website, with incredible fully responsive designs and full of functions.
languages.React: Bookstore in which I specialize to layout, style and add functionality to your site and thus be able to offer you the best quality of projects.
languages.JS: Vast knowledge in what is basically the engine of a functional site in order to cover the needs of each client.
languages.node: Environment in which I specialize on the back-end side in order to develop your fullstack application.
languages.tailwind: Library to apply styles that I use the most to facilitate animations and complex elements in order to carry out your project as soon as possible.
